text_block_list.text:
Summer Training Camp had started. Mejiro Ramonu was stoically 
carrying out the training without any input from me.
――Haa…… Haa……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Huu――!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
She was doing everything perfectly, there were no issues. 
But, not being able to understand what she's thinking had me worried……

Thanks for the meal. 
Then, back to training――
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are~. Hey, did you hear? 
Seems like there's going to be a festival tonight.
text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! And, that thing from your hometown…… 
what was it called? You know, that! That tasty 
looking gourmet food is going to be sold――
text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague

text_block_list.text:
He was all smiles as he talked about the place. To me, 
it wasn't too unusual, but the night festival sounded fun.

Well, keep it in mind. A bunch of the other trainers 
and their Uma Musume are going too. Things'll go 
much smoother that way, after all. Hahahaa.
text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague

text_block_list.text: I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
I thought maybe if we went together we could interact 
more, but it seems she's not interested. Well, knowing 
her, she might change her mind later, maybe……?
choice_data_list: (If she's in a good mood, I'll ask……?)

text_block_list.text:
Or, at least that was what I was thinking, but…… In the evening, 
a butler from the Mejiro family came looking for her.

――And so, I was entrusted with this invitation 
by the fans. The party will be held on a modest 
ship nearby, so they would like you to attend……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Butler

text_block_list.text: I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
It's being held by that businessman who sends 
gifts almost every month. Apparently they happened 
to be here attempting to escape the heat.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Butler

text_block_list.text: Who might that be……?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Well, it's fine. 『I will attend』, would you mind telling them?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
The butler bowed and left. I was surprised by how 
sudden it was, but for her, I guess it was normal.

Seems like the night breeze is coming in 
……Notify the school, would you?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: ……Hello?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Heeeeeey~, finished with training~? 
About the festival, what're you gonna do?
text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
Mejiro Ramonu
choice_data_list: She has something to attend to

text_block_list.text: I didn't ask you to come with me though?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
choice_data_list: I want to go with you
I want to go with you

text_block_list.text: Hmmmmm. ……I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Okay……! Then, next time when we get a chance~~!
text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague

text_block_list.text:
Then, I followed her to the venue written on 
the invitation. There was a luxurious cruise 
ship moored by the dock in the distance.

In any case, this was probably fine. I wasn't invited so, 
I was thinking of just waiting for her nearby.

Aaaah~~! Ramonu-san! I've been waiting for you…… 
Oh, that badge…… are you Ramonu-san's trainer!?
text_block_list.name: Ramonu Fan

text_block_list.text:
I see, since it's training camp I suppose it's normal 
your trainer would be with you……! I apologize 
for forgetting about that. Now, to the ship……!
text_block_list.name: Ramonu Fan

text_block_list.text: So she says……lucky you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
On deck, a sparkly scene spread before me. The ship headed 
offshore, leaving the hustle and bustle of land behind.

I had come as Mejiro Ramonu's chaperone. I'd have to behave 
in a proper manner. On the other hand, she acted as normal.
What a nice sea breeze……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Good evening, Ramonu-san. I'm honored to meet you! 
I always watch your races. Your spring results were wonderful……
text_block_list.name: Celeb A

text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. I see you also like races.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Oooh, it really is Ramonu-san……! I heard you would be attending 
today, so I thought I just had to come and meet you.
text_block_list.name: Celeb B

text_block_list.text: Oh, I'm honored.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
She exchanged words with many people as if it was natural. 
I was so nervous and shy, all I could do was just smile and nod.

――Ooh, lessons like that too…… ――Oh, that person from the URA……? 
――I'll go see your races in the fall…… ――He's a classmate of mine……
text_block_list.name: Multiple Celebs

text_block_list.text:
――Right, right! This year I vacationed around there. I was tired 
of traveling abroad so I wanted to see some famous local places too.
text_block_list.name: Celeb C

text_block_list.text: Oh. That's Trainer-san's hometown, isn't it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Am I wrong?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Yes, something wrong with that?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Oooh, so that's your hometown! Well, it's quite a fine place. 
I took a bunch of photos, take a look!
text_block_list.name: Celeb C
choice_data_list: Ah, I've been to that place too……!
Ah, I've been to that place too……!

text_block_list.text:
Before I realized it, I was joining in on the lively conversations 
as well. My stress disappeared and I ended up having a great time.

――Eventually, the ship returned to shore and 
the party ended. The walk back to training camp 
was quiet, as if I had woken up from a dream……
……Oh, I just happened to remember it.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Keeping the conversation going is just the basics of socializing……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
It's not possible that……you thought I was the type 
of Uma Musume who couldn't handle that much, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Hmmm……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
It felt like I was finally reflected in her eyes. 
Even after telling her, her expression remained unchanged.
You sure like to exaggerate
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
